description:
A highschool student, Jintarou, failed miserably in his confession of love.

His misfortune continued, and he contracted a sex-transformation condition that was all over the news. His gender was swapped and he was transformed into a beautiful silver-haired girl. He was so shocked that he decided to escape reality by immersing in a VR game…

Jintarou played in the form as the same little girl he was in real life, and he was constantly trying to master his alchemy skills, which other players said were garbage skills.

『Become a mercenary and fight, steal, dominate, explore, pioneer, produce — you are free to live your life!』 In the world of Clan・Clan where you are free to do as you like, he met various mercenaries (players) and developed with a smile.

Jintarou claimed to his friends that his appearance was a bug, and he went on his adventures while hiding the fact the he turned into a cute girl in real life.

When summer vacations ends, they will meet at school.

This was the story of an alchemist who will be able to fight in a “war” comparable to the military and national class.

What would really happen when a high school boy was suddenly transformed into a beautiful girl?

The answer was to become hikikomori, a hopeless net gamer.>
